backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing donations, spending, user profiles, and admin-protected actions using an authorization mixin and in‑memory lists/maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React router configuration defining all public and admin routes wrapped in theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/SpendingFo: Form for admins to create spending records with validation, balance checks, and mutation handling.
Component that restricts access to admin-only content based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and clearing cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal shown to authenticated users without a saved profile, allowing them to enter and save name, email, and phone.
frontend/src/components/donate/DonationF: Handles donation submission with amount, donor info, and optional message, supporting both authenticated and anonymous donors.
frontend/src/components/donors/DonorsTab: Displays a clickable table of donor profiles with initials, contact info, join date, and total donated.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Shows an access denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with copyright text and a link crediting caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Displays the site header with navigation, donate button, login, and responsive mobile menu, including admin links when applicable.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top‑level layout combining header, footer, routed content, and the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ledger/LedgerFil: Provides UI controls for filtering and sorting ledger transactions by type and date.
frontend/src/components/ledger/LedgerTab: Shows a table of donation and spending transactions with type, description, date, amount, and status, linking to transaction details.
frontend/src/components/ledger/RecentTra: Combines donation and spending records, sorts them by timestamp, and displays the ten most recent with navigation links.
frontend/src/components/ledger/SpendingB: Groups spending records into categories and renders a pie chart showing category distribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the current authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity storage, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for donations, spending, user profiles, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider context.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDonationsP: Admin page for reviewing, confirming, and declining donations, highlighting pending items and recent activity.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSpendingPa: Admin-only page that displays trust balance, recent spending records, and a form to add new spending entries.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing trust balance, donation and spending stats, hero section, and recent transactions using various query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DonatePage.tsx: Donation page with promotional content and a DonationForm, supporting anonymous or authenticated donors.
frontend/src/pages/DonorDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed donor profile info and their donation history with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/DonorsPage.tsx: Lists all donor profiles in a table with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LedgerPage.tsx: Combines and filters donations and spending records into a sortable transaction ledger.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionDetailPage: Shows detailed information for a single donation or spending record with status, amount, and timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning URL hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata file describing features, requirements, current state, and image needs for the trust donation platform.
